title: New: Darling Din – Killing To Be Bright
content:
Killing To Be Bright has kept me company through August so far, giving the hottest month of the summer that special melancholic touch during.

Brooklyn based trio Darling Din give off a dynamic psyched dream pop aura in a way not too dissimilar to Wye Oak, placing this freshly surfaced indie band amongst my favourite emerging acts of the past few months.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d44
